titles.title: Ensuring Ukrainian Sovereignty Act
Ensuring Ukrainian Sovereignty Act
A bill to terminate United States economic and military assistance to any country that recognizes Russia's efforts to annex any part of Ukraine.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Ensuring Ukrainian Sovereignty Act
This bill requires the immediate termination of all economic and military assistance to any country that recognizes Russia's annexation of any part of Ukraine.
